flow-definition.description:
Partitions are initialized using the Genomic Data Merge job using two studies assigned to a partition.
# Prereqs * Job Requirements. - Need a data driven way to associate a groups of studies to a partition - This job should take two of the studies from the group and initialize the partition. - Once a partition is primed the partitioned output s3 location should be used for the dataset1_s3_location in the Data Merge Pipeline job that will handling iterating over the remaining studies in the group.
